CreateLowProfileResponse.description: Response for creating low profile page

ResponseCode.description: if equel zero then success , else , a develper error see Description for more info

LowProfileId.description: The unique Id of the low profile page - save it in you data base!

Url.description: the url you need to redirect the card holder

UrlToPayPal.description: the url you need to redirect the card holder

UrlToBit.description: the url you need to redirect the card holder

ErrorInfo.description: error information for non http status 200

ResponseCode.description: if equel zero then success , else , a develper error see Description for more info

CreateLowProfile.description: create a new one time, Iframe \ redirect page

Operation.description: Type of operation to perform , default - ChargeOnly

ReturnValue.description: A string of data to save on the transaction, usually send your unique order Id, you will get it back in the WebHook URL

SuccessRedirectUrl.description: Url to redirect the card holder on successful transaction , (http(s)://site.com/Success)

FailedRedirectUrl.description: Url to redicet on failed transaction (http(s)://site.com/failed)

WebHookUrl.description: A webhook URL is a web address that receives real-time data about the transaction

ProductName.description: Text to show to card holder if no documents is send

ISOCoinId.description: ISO Coin Code ,1 - ILS, 2 - USD, else ISO Coin from list : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

UIDefinition.description: UI Definition for the created page
UI Definition for the created page

CardOwnerNameValue.description: Fill the value of CardOwnerName input box

CardOwnerIdValue.description: Card onwer Id aka teudat zeut

CardOwnerPhoneValue.description: Fill the value of CardOwnerPhone input box

CardOwnerEmailValue.description: fill the value of card owner email

IsCardOwnerEmailRequired.description: Is card owner email input box required

CSSUrl.description: Full URL address of CSS file. it will be injected to page, required CardCom premition (http(s)://site.com/file.css)

CustomFields.description: Fill the value of CustomFields input box by Field Id

GooglePayBtnDesign.description: Set how the Google Pay button will appear

ButtonType.description: GPay button type (text on the button)

JValidateType.description: Type of transaction for credit card in operation : CreateTokenOnly or Suspended deal, can be J2 (simple card validation) or J5 (authoriz)

CreditType.description: Type of credit for the card, for israel cards only.  6 - israel credit for multiple payments

IsRefundDeal.description: Is the transaction will be a refund deal

ApiPassword.description: Required only if IsRefundDeal is true

ISOCoinName.description: ISO name (alternative to IsoCoinId). ISO Coin Name from list : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

MinNumOfPayments.description: Minimum number of payment to show to card holder

MaxNumOfPayments.description: Maximum number of payment to show to card holder , default 1

SelectedNumOfPayments.description: Change the selectd number of payments in the UI selection box , default (MinNumOfPayments)

FirstPayment.description: Change the selectd number of payments in the UI selection box , default (MinNumOfPayments)

ConstPayment.description: Change the selectd number of payments in the UI selection box , default (MinNumOfPayments)

Token.description: 3-D secure and Token tranzactions can use token instead of card number,it will be used to charge the customer if exist

CardExpirationYear.description: Card expiration year will be pre-set to the customer. 4 characters string.

CardExpirationMonth.description: Card expiration Month will be pre-set to the customer. Values 01-12

CardNumber.description: Full card number, a token will be created and can be used to start 3DS process and charge

CVV.description: CVV used for 3DS process and charge

ThreeDSecureState.description: should this Tranasaction pass 3DSecure? Auto (or null): 3-D Secure validation will be performed as it configured by CardCom definition. Enable - Transaction will pass 3-D Secure validation. Disable - Transaction will NOT pass 3-D Secure validation

ShouldOpenPinpadOnPageLoad.description: Will open PinPad charge window on load

IsExternal.description: Is payment performed in external payment page

IsEnable.description: Set to True if the tranzactio will be charge by the merchent and not by the card holder

IsOpenSum.description: allow the merchent to change the sum of the transaction

ChargeOnSwipe.description: When using Credit Card reader , will the "commit" button be press after the merchent swipe the credit card

allOf.description: Create document in Low Profile interface

IsAllowEditDocument.description: Allow the card owner to edit the "document" information: To, address, phone... (not the products and amount) , default = false

IsShowOnlyDocument.description: Will only show the document information to the card owner. NO DOCCUMENT WILL BE CREATED. default = false (system will create a document)

Language.description: The language of the document to be created.

DocumentTypeToCreate.description: Document type to create,  default = 0, will automatically update from admin panel configuration

TaxId.description: Business registration number or user Identity number

Email.description: Email To send the document to

Comments.description: comments to print on the document

IsVatFree.description: Is all the items in this document are VAT free?

DepartmentId.description: department ID as show at the admin panel, for reports

ExternalId.description: External Id, custom info on document

IsAutoCreateUpdateAccount.description:
Is to Auto update or create an Account, default = auto, will automatically update from admin panel configuration 
                   EMAIL . (         )

AccountForeignKey.description: The account number on a Foreign system, use for transfer to 3-party account system ( hashavshevet, SAP )

SiteUniqueId.description: Your system unique Id for this account

AccountID.description: Unique account ID in cardcom system, account must exist in CardCom system

IsLoadInfoFromAccountID.description: If AccountID is passed, CardCom system will update the document information ( To ,HP_TZ, Email ...) from existing accounts information

TotalLineCost.description: Recommended, if the Quantity contains decimal point send the total line cost to prevent round errors

IsVatFree.description: Is this product VAT Free , used for mix VAT items in one documents

LowProfileResult.description: Result of the low profile page deal

ResponseCode.description: if equel zero then success , else , a develper error see Description for more info

LowProfileId.description: The unique ID of the low profile transaction

TranzactionId.description: The Id of the Credit card Transacion

ReturnValue.description: Same value that was sent on the CreateLowProfile request

UIValues.description: Will contain the value that the card holder enter in the UI

DocumentInfo.description: Will no be null is a documents is created

TokenInfo.description: Created token information, Will no be null at operations:  ChargeAndCreateToken, CreateTokenOnly

SuspendedInfo.description: SuspendedI deal information, Will no be null at operations: SuspendedDeal

TranzactionInfo.description: Transaction information, Will no be null at operations: ChargeOnly, ChargeAndCreateToken

LowProfileUIValues.description: values that was filled the the card holder

NumOfPayments.description: number of payments for the deal

CustomFields.description: Custome Fields values that were sent alongside the deal.

IsAbroadCard.description: boolean - is the card from isreal or is it a tourist card

ResponseCode.description: if equel zero then success , else , a develper error see Description for more info

AccountId.description: Unique account Id in cardcom system

ForeignAccountNumber.description: Customer accounting number, only if a customer card was created or consolidated.

SiteUniqueId.description: Unique identifier for the site - informative parameter.

DocumentUrl.description: Url to a document (invoice, etc), if created

TokenInfo.description: Create token result, You need to save all of the information in the database next to the account, it will be used in the Token charge process

Token.description: Credit card token use it for future charges

TokenExDate.description: The date that the toke will be deleted from CardCom system, yyyyMMdd

TokenApprovalNumber.description: Issuer approval number for capture operation

SuspendedDealId.description: Suspended deal Id, can be charge via API or the admin panel

ResponseCode.description: if equal zero then success , 700 and 701 success for J2 and J5 transaction

TranzactionId.description: The Id of the Credit card Tranzacion

CoinId.description: ISO Coin Code ,1 - ILS, 2 - USD, else ISO Coin from list : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

FirstCardDigits.description: The first digits of the credit card.

JParameter.description: J-parameter, type of test to perform on the card

ApprovalNumber.description: Approval Number given by the manufacturer

NumberOfPayments.description: The number of payments for the deal.

CardInfo.description: the card type, from where was it manifactured.

Token.description: The token number, Eve, will be saved in the database.

SapakMutav.description: Customer number at work in Rab Benteb

Uid.description: Unique transaction identifier If a credit/cancellation was made from the transaction, the UID will be the same as the original transaction. Otherwise, the UID will be different.

Rrn.description: Identification number for credit card companies

Brand.description: the card brand, vias\ mastercard \ dinners \ americal express.

PaymentType.description: Credit type - regular debit \ payment \ credit \ discount

DealType.description: Type + Transaction Source - Cancellation \ Debit \ Direct Debit \ Credit

CustomFields.description: The custome values that were filled and forwarded

LowProfileId.description: The unique Id of the low profile transaction

ReportCode.description: Report Code ,1 - New Credit Card, 2 - Card was canceled  no new number issued, 3 - CHB, 4 - Card was canceled  no new number issued , 5 - Card Unfreeze

ResponseCode.description: Response code , if it equel to zero than all is OK , else error see Description

InternalDecription.description: private description - not shown to card holder

TotalNumOfBills.description: total num of charges to do

IsActive.description: is recurring is active and will be chanrge

ChargeIntervals.description: the chanrge intervals, will be add to NextDateToBill (day, month , year)

FinalDebitCoinId.description: currency to charge , 1- NIS , 2 - USD , else iso currency table

IsDocumentCreate.description: crate a document for the charge

DocTypeToCreate.description: the doc type that will be created , 0 for auto

Comment.description: private comment - not shown to card holder

IsPrintNumOfPayments.description: add num of payments on the item descriptin in the document, add : (TotalNumOfBills of NumOfPaymentsAlreadyCharged )

IsPrintBillMonth.description: add the month of the 'NextDateToBill' to the item description

UserId.description: use id - that create the recurring

FlexItem.description: amount to charge, only if IsByProducts==false

IsByProducts.description: if true then ProdList is used to calculate cost , if flase then FlexItem is used to calculate cost

ProdList.description: list of prod to change , and amount will be taken for the system products table, only if IsByProducts==true

ResponseCode.description: Response code , if it equel to zero than all is OK , else error see Description

Status.description: SUCCESSFUL , PENDINGFORPROCESSING , DEBTAUTOBILLING , LOSTDEBT , PAYBYOTHERE  , ONHOLD , UNKNOWN + (error Code)

AccountId.description: AccountId for history not req if you send RowId

FromDate.description: FromDate CreateDate , format  DDMMYYYY , req only if AccountId is sent

ToDate.description: ToDate CreateDate , format DDMMYYYY , req only if AccountId is sent

ExtGetListOfFilesRsp.description: List of new Token to update

ExcelRow.description: The row number of this work

OriginalStatus.description: information only , original code of the acquiring
